Font Text Wrapping Test - Monospace
    
    Code Container - Normal Wrapping
    
// This is a test of monospace text wrapping
function longFunctionNameThatMightWrapInNarrowContainers() {
    const veryLongVariableNameThatDemonstratesWrapping = "test";
    return veryLongVariableNameThatDemonstratesWrapping.length;
}
    
    
    Narrow Container - Force Breaking
